trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section used by classes in the <xref href="System.Drawing"></xref> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个配置节中的类使用<xref href="System.Drawing"></xref>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Configuration.SystemDrawingSection"></xref> class.

Gets or sets the suffix to append to a file name indicated by a <xref href="System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute"></xref> when an assembly is declared with a <xref href="System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSameAssemblyAttribute"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSatelliteAssemblyAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要附加到指示的文件名称的后缀<xref href="System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute"></xref>程序集使用的声明时<xref href="System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSameAssemblyAttribute"></xref>或<xref href="System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSatelliteAssemblyAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The bitmap suffix is appended to the file name before the extension.
trans-unit.target: 位图后缀将追加到扩展名之前的文件名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, with a bitmap suffix of ".test.1.0", a <xref:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute> reference to "my.bmp" is interpreted as "my.test.1.0.bmp".
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用位图后缀"。 test.1.0"即<xref:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute>对"my.bmp"的引用将解释为"my.test.1.0.bmp"。</xref:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute>
